text: alm yat hwla' almunafiqin khbr aladhin mdu min qawm nuh wqbylt ead wqbylt thamud waqawm 'iibrahim wa'ashab (mdyn) waqawm lut eindama ja'ahum almursalun bialwahy wbayat allah fkdhdhabwhm? fa'anzal allah bhwla' jmyeana edhabh; antqamana minhum lisu' emlhm, fama kan allah lyzlmhm, wlkn kanuu hum alzaalimin lanfshm baltkdhyb walmkhalft
